response.name: Mrs Skower's All-Purpose Magical Mess Remover
response.effect: Cleans stains

response.effect: Causes the drinker to become infatuated with the giver of the potion

response.effect: Causes the drinker to become infatuated with the giver of the potion

response.name: Cupid Crystals
response.effect: Causes the drinker to become infatuated with the giver of the potion

response.name: Bruise removal paste
response.effect: Heals bruises in an hour

response.name: Love potion
response.effect: Infatuation with whoever offers the potion
response.sideEffects: Embarrassment on the part of the drinker

response.name: Ten-Second Pimple Vanisher
response.effect: Treats boils, pimples, blackheads and acne

response.name: Kissing Concoction
response.effect: Causes the drinker to become infatuated with the giver of the potion

response.name: Sleekeazy's Hair Potion
response.effect: Makes hair more manageable

response.name: Dr Ubbly's Oblivious Unction
response.effect: Heals wounds left by negative thoughts

response.name: Grand Pepperup Potion
response.effect: Relieves and/or cures cold symptoms
response.sideEffects: Causes steam to come out of the drinker's ears for a few hours

response.name: Pepperup Potion
response.effect: Cures common cold; Warms up recipient

response.name: Elixir of Life
response.effect: Immortality
response.sideEffects: Drinker becomes dependent upon advanced age

response.name: Skele-Gro
response.effect: Restores bones
response.characteristics: Smokes when poured; Vile taste; Burns on the way down; Yellow in colour

response.name: Beautification Potion
response.effect: Enhances the attractiveness of the drinker's physical appearance

response.name: Gregory's Unctuous Unction
response.effect: Makes the drinker think the one who gave them the potion is their best friend

response.name: Everklena
response.effect: Supposedly cleans, but actually spawns mould and grime

response.name: Baruffio's Brain Elixir
response.effect: Allegedly increases one's brain power
response.sideEffects: Possibly harmful mental side effects if brewed incorrectly

response.name: Wolfsbane Potion
response.effect: Allows werewolves to keep their minds post-transformation
response.characteristics: Faint blue smoke; Unpleasant taste; Rendered useless with sugar

response.name: Regerminating Potion
response.effect: Germinates plants

response.name: Emerald Potion
response.effect: Induces fear, delirium, intense stomach pain and extreme thirst in the drinker
response.characteristics: Emerald green in colour; Glows phosphorescently

response.name: Shrinking Solution
response.effect: Causes living beings to shrink to a smaller form

response.name: Doxycide
response.effect: Temporarily stuns Doxies so that the pests can be removed from a home
response.characteristics: Black in colour; Typically delivered as a spray

response.name: Felix Felicis
response.effect: Makes the drinker lucky
response.sideEffects: Giddiness and recklessness with overuse; Extremely toxic in large quantities; Highly disastrous if brewed incorrectly
response.characteristics: Molten gold in colour; Droplets leap like goldfish above potion's surface when in cauldron
